item.title: 越南监管机构下令加强股票交易监管
item.description: 在市场近期大幅反弹之后，越南国家证券委员会已指示证券交易所和相关机构加强对股票交易的监管。【原文：Vietnam’s State Securities Commission has directed stock exchanges and relevant agencies to strengthen supervision of equity transactions following a recent sharp rally in the market.】

item.title: 东京电子解雇涉嫌窃取台积电技术的工人
item.description: 东京电子有限公司（Tokyo Electron Ltd.）表示，该公司已经解雇了其台北分公司的一名员工，这是该公司自岛国政府逮捕六名涉嫌窃取台湾半导体制造股份有限公司（TSMC）商业机密的人员以来首次发表公开声明。【原文：Tokyo Electron Ltd. said it’s fired an employee at its Taipei unit, making its first public statement since the island’s government arrested six people suspected of stealing trade secrets from Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.】

item.title: 美国竞争对手 Cboe 挑战市场主导地位后，澳大利亚证券交易所股价跳水
item.description: 由于来自 Cboe Global Markets Inc 的潜在市场竞争以及监管问题，澳大利亚陷入困境的主要交易所运营商 ASX Ltd 股价创下两年来最大跌幅。【原文：ASX Ltd shares tumbled the most in two years as potential market competition from Cboe Global Markets Inc and regulatory issues weigh on Australia’s embattled main exchange operator.】

item.title: 李明博称贸易协议缓解了韩国利率决议前的压力
item.description: 韩国银行行长李昌镛（Rhee Chang Yong）表示，韩国与美国达成的贸易协议 "有助于减轻 "本月利率决议前的 "重大负担"。【原文：South Korea’s trade deal with the US “helped ease a significant burden” before this month’s rate decision, Bank of Korea Governor Rhee Chang Yong said.】

item.title: 菲律宾经济在美国关税动荡中超出预期
item.description: 在美国关税威胁全球贸易之际，菲律宾第二季度经济增长超过预期，凸显了这个依赖消费的国家的韧性。【原文：The Philippine economy grew more than expected in the second quarter, highlighting the consumption-reliant nation’s resilience as US tariffs threaten global trade.】

item.title: 巴西苏扎诺公司因关税不确定性削减纸浆产量
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收贸易关税的不确定性，巴西苏扎诺公司（Suzano SA）与最大市场中国客户的谈判受到影响，该公司正在削减木浆产量。【原文：Brazilian company Suzano SA is cutting wood-pulp production after negotiations with clients in China, its biggest market, were hit by uncertainty over US President Donald Trump’s trade tariffs.】

item.title: 能源资本成为 31 亿美元 GFL 交易的领跑者
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Energy Capital Partners 正在就收购 GFL Environmental Inc.【原文：Energy Capital Partners is in advanced negotiations to buy a minority stake in GFL Environmental Inc.’s infrastructure affiliate, with the deal expected to value the business at around C$4.25 billion ($3.1 billion) including debt, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 苹果扩大长达 18 年之久的 iPhone 玻璃交易以规避特朗普关税
item.description: 苹果公司（Apple Inc.首席执行官蒂姆-库克（Tim Cook）正在使用一种熟悉的策略来博得唐纳德-特朗普的好感：扩大现有计划，以表明他支持总统的 "美国制造 "议程。【原文：Apple Inc. Chief Executive Officer Tim Cook is using a familiar strategy to stay in Donald Trump’s good graces: expanding existing initiatives to show he supports the president’s “Made in the USA” agenda.】

item.title: 关税叠加的困惑阻碍了日本达成美国贸易协议的努力
item.description: 本周四，日本首席谈判代表访问华盛顿，要求落实将汽车进口税削减至 15%的承诺，这凸显了对日美贸易协议的新的解释分歧。【原文：A fresh discrepancy in interpretations of the US-Japan trade deal came to the fore on Thursday, as Japan’s chief negotiator visits Washington to press for follow-through on a pledge to cut a levy on car imports to 15%.】

item.title: 印尼开始首次分两期发售袋鼠债券
item.description: 印度尼西亚周四开始发售首只以澳元计价的袋鼠债券，以寻求多元化的资金来源。【原文：Indonesia started offering its first Australian dollar-denominated Kangaroo bond Thursday as the country sought to diversify funding sources.】

item.title: 资生堂利润超出预期，最高跃升 11
item.description: 资生堂公司第二季度利润超出预期，该公司股价周四上午大涨 11%，创近四个月来最大涨幅。【原文：Shiseido Co. shares surged as much as 11% on Thursday morning, the most in nearly four months, after the company’s second quarter profit beat estimates.】

item.title: 特朗普关税议程成为头条新闻，黄金止跌回升
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的最新贸易举措，包括威胁对芯片进口征收 100%的关税，给黄金带来了不确定性，但黄金仍保持温和跌势。【原文：Gold held a moderate loss, as traders looked past uncertainty created by US President Donald Trump’s latest trade moves, including threatening a 100% tariff on chip imports.】

item.title: 美联储降息押注将使印尼债券比同行更受提振
item.description: 随着对美联储降息预期的不断升温，印尼债券很可能成为亚洲最大的受益者，从而刺激整个地区出现一连串的上涨。【原文：Indonesian bonds are likely to be the biggest beneficiary in Asia as growing expectations of Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts spur a cascade of gains across the region.】

item.title: 交易员撇清美国对俄举动的影响，石油保持跌势
item.description: 石油连续五天下跌，创下自一月份以来的最长跌势，原因是投资者在追踪美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）推动停止乌克兰战争的外交努力的同时，也在关注美国惩罚俄罗斯原油买家的努力。【原文：Oil held a five-day decline — the longest losing run since January — as investors looked beyond US efforts to punish buyers of Russian crude, while tracking a diplomatic push by President Donald Trump to halt the war in Ukraine.】

item.title: 南美头号牛肉运输商在关税前建立美国库存
item.description: 据南美最大的牛肉出口商巴西公司的财务主管称，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对巴西征收 50%的关税之前，该公司已在美国建立了库存。【原文：The top exporter of beef from South America has built up inventories in the US ahead of President Donald Trump’s 50% tariffs on Brazil, according to its top fianance boss.】

item.title: 英格兰银行将降息至两年低点
item.description: 英国央行将把利率下调至两年多来的最低水平，因为英国央行的决策者们正在应对经济放缓和就业市场因税收增加而受到的冲击。【原文：The Bank of England is set to cut interest rates to the lowest level in over two years, as its policymakers contend with a slowing economy and a jobs market rattled by higher taxes.】

item.title: 私人信贷助推亚洲 "先买后付 "借贷热潮
item.description:
各国政府正就高利率债务的风险向消费者发出警告。放贷人表示，他们正在开拓服务不足的市场。【原文：

Governments are warning consumers about the risk of high-rate debt. Lenders say they’re opening up underserved markets.

】

item.title: 瑞银称中国房地产下滑持续时间将超预期
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）曾是预测中国房地产业复苏的少数几家公司之一，但现在该集团预计，随着第二季度销售再次放缓，中国房地产业的复苏将被推迟。【原文：UBS Group AG, which had been among the few firms predicting a recovery in China’s property sector, now expects a delay following a renewed sales slowdown in the second quarter.】

item.title: 智利铜矿崩塌后，Codelco 正在寻求重启
item.description: 据知情人士透露，智利最大的铜矿上周因致命事故停工后，Codelco 提出了重启部分工程的申请。【原文：Codelco filed a request to restart parts of its biggest copper mine in Chile after a deadly accident halted work last week, according to people briefed on the matter.】

item.title: 星展银行因手续费和交易收入增加而盈利超预期
item.description: 星展集团控股有限公司（DBS Group Holdings Ltd.）公布的第二季度利润超出预期，主要得益于交易和财富手续费收入的大幅增长。【原文：DBS Group Holdings Ltd. reported second-quarter profit that beat expectations, buoyed by a jump in income from trading and wealth fees.】

item.title: 特朗普提出芯片关税后，美国期货攀升：市场综述
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普警告可能对芯片进口征收100%的关税后，美国期货攀升，亚洲股票期货涨跌不一。【原文：US futures climbed and Asian equity futures were mixed after President Donald Trump warned he may impose a 100% tariff on chip imports.】

item.title: 宏利收购 Comvest，建立价值 184 亿美元的私人信贷部门
item.description: 宏利金融公司（Manulife Financial Corp. ）同意收购 Comvest Credit Partners 的多数股权，从而创建一个价值 184 亿美元的私人信贷平台，以加速其在另类投资领域的扩张。【原文：Manulife Financial Corp. agreed to buy a majority stake in Comvest Credit Partners, creating an $18.4 billion private credit platform as the insurer accelerates its expansion into alternative investments.】

item.title: 航天器制造商 Firefly 通过扩大首次公开募股规模融资 8.68 亿美元
item.description: Firefly Aerospace 公司在首次公开募股中筹集了 8.68 亿美元，股票定价高于市场范围，反映了卫星发射服务需求的激增。【原文：Firefly Aerospace Inc. raised $868 million in an upsized initial public offering, pricing its shares above a marketed range in a reflection of the surging demand for satellite launch services.】

item.title: 日本政治困境促使对 30 年期债券拍卖持谨慎态度
item.description: 日本的政治和财政不确定性不断增加，可能会拖累周四举行的 30 年期国债拍卖需求，因为投资者情绪脆弱，导致收益率持续走高。【原文：Japan’s mounting political and fiscal uncertainties risk weighing on demand at an auction of 30-year government debt on Thursday as fragile investor sentiment keeps yields elevated.】

item.title: Blackstone 私募债务基金减持最大持股 Medallia
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 基金进一步削减了 Thoma Bravo 支持的软件公司 Medallia Inc.【原文：A Blackstone Inc. fund further cut the value of a private credit loan for Thoma Bravo-backed software company Medallia Inc., the vehicle’s largest holding.】

item.title: 特朗普希望对芯片征收 100% 的关税，但对苹果等美国投资者征收 0% 的关税
item.description: 在苹果公司（Apple Inc.苹果公司首席执行官蒂姆-库克（Tim Cook）和总统在椭圆形办公室宣布了一项新的 1000 亿美元投资计划。【原文：Donald Trump said he would impose a 100% tariff on imports that include semiconductors, though would exempt companies moving production back to the United States, as Apple Inc. CEO Tim Cook and the president announced a fresh $100 billion investment plan from the Oval Office.】

item.title: Blackstone 出资 10 亿美元创建 F&G 再保险池
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 正在创建一个价值 10 亿美元的再保险机构，该机构将承担 F&G Annuities & Life Inc.【原文：Blackstone Inc. is creating a $1 billion reinsurance vehicle that will assume some of the risk on the books of F&G Annuities & Life Inc.】

item.title: 据说 WhiteFiber 在美国首次公开募股中筹集了 1.594 亿美元资金
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，人工智能基础设施公司 WhiteFiber Inc.【原文：WhiteFiber Inc., an artificial intelligence infrastructure firm, raised $159.4 million in an initial public offering, pricing its shares at the top of a marketed range, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国玉米产量创历史新高，推动作物化学制造商获利增长
item.description: 今年美国玉米收成创纪录的预期推动了农用化学品巨头 Nutrien Ltd. 和 Corteva Inc.【原文：Expectations of a record US corn crop this year fueled earnings from agricultural chemical giants Nutrien Ltd. and Corteva Inc.】

item.title: 特斯拉前高管创办汽车人工智能公司 DensityAI
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，特斯拉公司超级计算机项目的前领导者们已经成立了一家新的人工智能公司，专注于汽车行业。【原文：Former leaders of Tesla Inc.’s supercomputer program have started a new artificial intelligence company focused on the automotive industry, according to people familiar with the matter.】
